issue_title: [Feature] 添加操作日志记录支持

implementation_summary.description: Added logging support to TodoStorage class for debugging and auditing storage operations
changes: Added logging import and module-level logger
Added DEBUG log on successful load with file path and todo count
Added DEBUG log on successful save with file path and todo count
Added DEBUG log when file doesn't exist (0 todos)
Added ERROR log on JSON parse errors
Added WARNING log on invalid format errors
Added ERROR log on save failures

risks_limitations: Logging uses Python's standard logging module at DEBUG level, which may not be visible by default in production
No configuration for custom logger injection - uses module-level logger
commands_executed: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py tests/test_issue_4723_storage_logging.py
